  • Module graphite

Module graphite¶

  • License: Apache 2.0
  • Version: 0.5.1
  • Author: Inmanta <code@inmanta.com>
  • Upstream project: https://github.com/inmanta/graphite.git

Entities¶

entity graphite::Carbon¶

Parents: ip::services::Server

Collect metrics and store them

relation graphite::Frontend graphite_frontend [0:1]¶

other end: graphite::Frontend.carbon_server [1]

The following implementations are defined for this entity:

  • graphite::carbonServerRedhat
  • graphite::carbonServerUbuntu

The following implements statements select implementations for this entity:

  • graphite::carbonServerRedhat constraint std::familyof(host.os,'redhat')
  • graphite::carbonServerUbuntu constraint std::familyof(host.os,'ubuntu')
entity graphite::Frontend¶

Parents: web::Application

relation graphite::Carbon carbon_server [1]¶

other end: graphite::Carbon.graphite_frontend [0:1]

The following implementations are defined for this entity:

  • graphite::graphiteWeb

The following implements statements select implementations for this entity:

  • graphite::graphiteWeb

Implementations¶

implementation graphite::carbonServerRedhat¶
implementation graphite::carbonServerUbuntu¶
implementation graphite::graphiteWeb¶
